txt.en: Mineral riches await those who brave the perilous cliff road circling Mount Doom.
You have successfully braved the mountain and defeated many Merrevail there.
Completed The Burning Mountain: Red Skies.

An urgent notice is pinned to the board:

'Merrevail have been spotted on Mount Doom. A brave adventurer is needed to defeat foes on the mountain. Seek out Candúr in Udûn to learn more.'

<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires The Burning Mountain: Blood Wings to be underway. If that quest has been completed or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter this instance in order to complete this quest.</rgb>
Red Skies on the Burning Mountain
Candúr can be found in Udûn.\n\nYou should talk Candúr.
Complete The Burning Mountain: Red Skies
